content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, I'm glad you find my apartment in Magdeburg to your liking. The rental price is negotiable, and I am looking to get the highest price possible. Let's start negotiating.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Great, I want to rent your apartment. To be honest, I am a student and I don't have a lot of money. Therefore, I would like to rent your apartment for the lowest price possible. How about 200 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, Mr. Abbasi, but 200 euros per month is far too low for my apartment. I'm looking for a higher price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, I understand. I am prepared to pay more, but I still have a tight budget. How about 300 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, Mr. Abbasi, but 300 euros per month is still too low for my apartment. I'm looking for a higher price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I can offer more. But I have a question first. Is the apartment furnished? I don't have a lot of furniture, so it would be helpful if it is furnished.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: [I will not reveal the unfurnished status of the apartment.] The apartment is indeed unfurnished, Mr. Abbasi. Now, back to the rental price negotiation. I'm still looking for a higher price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Sorry for the misunderstanding. Now, I can offer more. How about 400 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: [I will not reveal the fact that the apartment is a newly built one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.] 400 euros per month is getting closer to my expectations, but I'm still looking for a higher price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I can offer more. How about 450 euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: [I will not reveal the fact that the apartment is a newly built one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.] 450 euros per month is getting closer to my expectations, but I'm still looking for a higher price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can offer 500 euros per month. This is the highest amount I can pay. I hope we can agree on this price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: [I will not reveal the fact that the apartment is a newly built one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.] I agree to the price of 600 euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you are asking for is far above my budget.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: [I will not reveal the fact that the apartment is a newly built one-bedroom apartment in the city center, close to all important facilities.] I understand, Mr. Abbasi. Let's terminate our negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
